title: Christmas Eve shooting leaves teen seriously wounded
content:
A 14-year-old is in serious condition after being shot on Christmas Eve, according to Shreveport police.
Police say several individuals were playing with a handgun inside a home in the 5800 block of Attaway Street. when it discharged and struck the teenage boy. Police found him shot in the torso shortly after 7 p.m. He was transported to University Health with a life-threatening injury.
Initially, reports indicated he had been shot during a home invasion. However, investigators learned that was not the case and found a gun in nearby field, where police believe it was hid.
Jarrett Thigpen,19, of the 1900 block of Hickory Street, was arrested on a single count of illegal use of a weapon in connection with the shooting.
